name: Ikemen Revolution: Otome Game
description:
Become the next Alice!
In 19th century London, a chase after a gentleman curiously resembling a white rabbit leads you to a land where magic surpasses reason. At the center of a struggle between Red and Black royal armies, which of the 14 Wonderland Ikémen will cast the spell of love on you?

Play Ikémen Revolution: Love & Magic in Wonderland, one of CYBIRD's most popular love simulation otome games in Japan, in English! Experience an enthralling interactive novel complete with vibrant music, gorgeous anime illustrations, and character voices. Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story. Free to download! Play now and find true romance with your one and only soul mate!

■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors
Lancelot Kingsley (Voice: Nobuhiko Okamoto)
Jonah Clemence (Voice: Natsuki Hanae)
Ray Blackwell (Voice: Hiro Shimono)
Fenrir Godspeed (Voice: Tetsuya Kakihara)
Sirius Oswald (Voice: Junichi Suwabe)
Edgar Bright (Voice: Taku Yashiro)
Luka Clemence (Voice: Junya Enoki)
Zero (Voice: Kentaro Kumagai)
Seth Hyde (Voice: Taishi Murata)
Kyle Ash (Voice: Makoto Furukawa)
Blanc Lapin (Voice: Yusuke Shirai)
Harr Silver (Voice: Junta Terashima)
Loki Genetta (Voice: Ayumu Murase)
Oliver Knight (Voice: Daiki Hamano)

■Collect Exclusive Cards and Compete in Destiny Duels
Cards have gorgeous illustrations featuring scenes from the main story, events, etc. Set your favorite Card as your Home background and he will speak to you! Cards have Rarity levels from 3 Stars to 5 Stars with varying features. 4 Stars and 5 Stars Cards include voiced lines so you can hear his enchanting voice!

■Dress Up with Cute Attire for your Avatar and His
Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars.
Gorgeous cinderella dresses, beautiful room backgrounds and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this anime game for women. Freely rotate your avatar and decorations for a mystic wonderland experience! Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends. Characters from the story are also available as avatars! Dress up your love interest for the perfect date night together.

■Shape Your Story Through the Choices You Make
In Ikémen Revolution there are two endings, Romantic or Dramatic, for each guy depending on the choices you make while reading this interactive novel. If you get enough points you might even receive intimate letters from your love! Along the way, unlock special His Side Stories told from his perspective to learn about his true feelings. Shall we find out which ending awaits you?

■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations
In this otome game with each character route, you can receive beautiful illustrations of your guy that will immerse you right into his story. You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events.

■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy
Ikémen Revolution holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading. Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and exclusive avatars!

What are you waiting for, Alice?

*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）
